ai-patthana15.53:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.53:0.3_0: he should apply himself to form, supported by the skillful.
ai-patthana15.53:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the skillful qualities that should be given up, relying on not seeing.
ai-patthana15.53:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of one day.’ ...
ai-patthana15.53:2.1_0: Seeing the unskillful should be given up, not understanding the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.53:2.1_1: One should not give up the unskillful.
ai-patthana15.53:2.1_2: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
ai-patthana15.53:3.1_0: not to be given up by not grasping.
ai-patthana15.53:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of two years.’ ...
